name: Turret The Targets
description: Welcome new recruits! Your mission is to hit the targets with your turret! You think that sounds simple? What if I told you that there is a wide variety of obstacles in your path which will involve puzzle solving and strategic planning? What if I told you that this academy takes pride in its dozens of challenging simulations? Do you have what it takes to complete them all? Hit targets, dodge lasers, ricochet bullets and unlock exciting new missions at the Turret Training Academy!
